snippet: The boy died from ingesting methadone hidden in a cold medicine bottle.
abstract: The boy died from ingesting methadone hidden in a cold medicine bottle.
lead_paragraph: A Bronx woman has been charged with reckless endangerment after her 6-year-old son died from ingesting methadone that the authorities said she had stored in a cold medicine bottle. But Bronx prosecutors said Friday that they were deferring prosecution pending the outcome of an autopsy, indicating that more serious charges are possible.
